content.prompt: The first derivative of the function f is defined by f'(x) = (x2 +1)sin(3x - 1) for -1.5 < x < 1.5. On which of the following intervals is the graph of f concave up?

topic.text: 5.6: Determining Concavity of Functions over Their Domains

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
